meanings.sent1: The meal was dissatisfactory because it was cold and tasteless.
meanings.sent2: The dissatisfactory service at the restaurant led to many negative reviews.
meanings.sent3: It was dissatisfactory to find out the ice cream truck had run out of ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The dissatisfactory weather made the beach trip less enjoyable.
meanings.sent5: The dissatisfactory movie ending left the audience disappointed.

meanings.definition: Failing to meet expectations or requirements.
meanings.sent1: The dissatisfactory report did not include all the necessary information.
meanings.sent2: Her dissatisfactory performance in the exam surprised her teachers.
meanings.sent3: It was dissatisfactory to see the cake collapse before the party.
meanings.sent4: The dissatisfactory car repair left the customer stranded on the highway.
meanings.sent5: The dissatisfactory product return policy upset many customers.
